u_shaped_ranking.context_window: Species were selected based on the availability of by-catch estimates and relevant demographic data which allows using one of the three assessment methods explained below. Emphasis was placed on species listed in the OSPAR List of Threatened and / or Declining Species and Habitats

u_shaped_ranking.core_sentence: Integration of species-specific assessments
u_shaped_ranking.context_window: This is a precautionary method only applied to OSPAR threatened and / or declining species to prevent further threatening of such species. Integration of species-specific assessments An integration of species assessments on the level of species groups is not intended in this pilot assessment, because only selected species are assessed.

u_shaped_ranking.context_window: Publication Number: 855/2022 Our vision is a clean, healthy and biologically diverse North-East Atlantic Ocean, which is productive, used sustainably and resilient to climate change and ocean acidification.
